TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IExtendContextMenu

Docs.summary: Enables a snap-in to add items to an existing shortcut menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about programming with the IExtendContextMenu interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

Docs.param: The command identifier of the menu item.
A pointer to the on the object for which the shortcut menu was displayed.
Docs.summary: The Microsoft Management Console (MMC) calls the Command method when one of the shortcut menu items that you added is selected.
